mapper.insert: insert into warranty (warranty_code, country, nbmc, insert_time) values (#{warrantyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nbmc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{insertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into warranty
warranty_code,
country,
nbmc,
insert_time,
